name: IRSS Stage for Eye-2
title: IRSS Stage for Eye-2
notes:
**Note 1:** This SSDI is effective for diagnosis years 2024+
* For cases diagnosed 2018-2023, leave this SSDI blank

**Note 2:** This data item records the stage of the second eye when there are bilateral retinoblastomas
* Code 7 if only one eye is involved (unilateral retinoblastoma)
  * Extension of one eye (unilateral retinoblastoma) is coded in Pediatric Primary Tumor

**Note 3:** If there are bilateral retinoblastomas, record the Stage Group of the lesser/lower stage in this data item (more advanced/higher stage is recorded in Pediatric Primary Tumor)

**Note 4:** Do not record a stage (Stage 0-IV) in this data item if only one eye is involved (See **Note 2**)

rows:
Stage 0
* Tumor confined to the globe
* Enucleation has not been performed
* Patient treated conservatively with either focal therapies or chemotherapy

Stage I
* Enucleation with negative margins (R0)
* Completely resected histologically

Stage II
* Enucleation with positive/microscopic residual tumor

Stage III
* Regional extension, involvement of 
   - Orbit
   - Preauricular extension
   - Cervical lymph node involvement

Not applicable: Only one eye is involved and staging collected in Pediatric Primary Tumor, Pediatric Regional Nodes and Pediatric Mets
* Unilateral retinoblastoma

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
